title: India Budget 2025 Allocates ₹1.2 Lakh Crore for EdTech and Digital Financial Infrastructure
description: In a significant move to modernize core sectors, the Government of India announced ₹1.2 lakh crore in combined funding for EdTech startups and digital financial infrastructure as part of Budget 2025. The education allocation focuses on building smart classrooms, AI-driven assessment platforms, and expanding public-private partnerships with skill-based learning platforms. Meanwhile, the finance segment targets regional fintech innovations, with special provisions for setting up credit access infrastructure in Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities, opening doors for SaaS players and NBFC-focused tech providers.
